column1: # This is a tab delimited spreadsheet (TSV) for all Heimdall messages.
# The message levels are best practice (b), info (i), warning (w), error (e), and critical (c).

column3: Could not find an experiment for path: '{path}'. A valid experiment folder contains an 'EntryModule' link.
The required EntryModule flow.xml file does not exist: ‘{flow_xml}’
The required EntryModule flow.xml file failed to parse as XML: ‘{flow_xml}’
All suites require the folders: ‘listings’, ‘sequencing’, ‘stats’, and ‘logs’. This suite is missing: {folders}
Soft links were found with targets that do not exist:\n{broken_links}
The flow XML children for module ‘{module_name}’ are defined in more than one flow XML:\n{flow_xmls}
The executable ‘nodelogger’ was given a bad signal ‘{bad_signal}’ for its ‘-s’ argument. Line {line_number} in: ‘{task_path}’
The task ‘{task_path}’ has no resource file at ‘{resource_path}’. This is required for the ‘{context}’ context.
The task ‘{task_path}’ has no resource file at ‘{resource_path}’. Create a resource file to avoid using unknown defaults.
The loop ‘{node_path}’ has no resource file at ‘{resource_path}’. Create a resource file to avoid using unknown defaults.
The file ‘{bad_file}’ contains references to deprecated filesystem paths:\n{paths}
